string.value: Basic Training continues. If you want to start the second stage of Basic Training, you should talk to #b#p1201000##k.

#p1201000# says that this time you have to go to #b#m140020100##k and defeat some #r#o0100132#s#k. Come to think of it, #p1201000# seems different from the time you first saw her, back when she had that mystical aura about her...
Shall we continue with your Basic Training? Before accepting, please make sure you have properly equipped your sword and your skills and potions are readily accessible in Hotkeys.

Alright. This time, let's have you defeat #r#o0100132#s#k, which are slightly more powerful than #o0100131#s. Head over to #b#m140020100##k and defeat #r15#k of them. That should help you build your strength. Alright! Let's do this!
Are you not ready to hunt the #o0100132#s yet? Always proceed if and only if you are fully ready. There's nothing worse than engaging in battles without sufficient preparation.
Oh, you were able to defeat all the #o0100132#s like I asked? You do look like you have gotten a bit stronger. Somewhere on the scale of...penguins flapping their wings?
Train a bit more, and you may one day be strong enough to carry a penguin all by yourself. Now talk to me when you're ready to move on to the next level.
I don't think you have defeated all the #r#o0100132#s#k yet. Please let me know when you have defeated all #r15#k of them. It's not that hard, is it? Come on, head to #b#m140020100##k.
